author: Staff Reporter
text: With the help of technology, police recovered a lorry, which was stolen by a gang, within 24 hours on Monday. Some unidentified persons stole a tipper lorry parked at a workshop in Meenakshinaickanpatti near here on Saturday night. Acting on a complaint filed by the lorry owner, Nagarajan, on Sunday morning, Thadikombu police registered a case.
title: Stolen lorry recovered
